column3: Other (income) and expense, net for 2015 and 2014 include charges of $40 and $421, respectively, related to the remeasurement of the Venezuelan balance sheet. In addition, 2015 includes charges of $108 for the deconsolidation of our Venezuelan operations and $1,358 for charges related to pension settlements and 2014 includes a charge of $35 related to a regulatory dispute in the Middle East. The results for 2013 include a balance sheet remeasurement charge of $36 due to a devaluation of the Venezuelan bolivar and a charge of $5 for European strategic changes.
Segment operating profit excludes other (income) and expense, net and income and expenses not associated with the business segments.
